extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade to V16.20.06 or Later
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade the affected software to version V16.20.06 or later to mitigate vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Loading Untrusted Arena Model Files
extracted_playbook.description: Do not load untrusted Arena model files to prevent potential security risks.

extracted_playbook.title: Prevent VBA File Stream Loading
extracted_playbook.description: Hold the control key down when loading files to help prevent the VBA file stream from loading.

extracted_playbook.title: Minimize Network Exposure
extracted_playbook.description: Minimize network exposure for all control system devices and/or systems, ensuring they are not accessible from the internet.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Firewalls and Isolate Networks
extracted_playbook.description: Locate control system networks and remote devices behind firewalls and isolate them from business networks.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Secure Remote Access Methods
extracted_playbook.description: When remote access is required, use more secure methods, such as Virtual Private Networks (VPNs), and ensure they are updated to the most current version available.

extracted_playbook.title: Perform Impact Analysis and Risk Assessment
extracted_playbook.description: Perform proper impact analysis and risk assessment prior to deploying defensive measures.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Cybersecurity Strategies for ICS
extracted_playbook.description: Implement recommended cybersecurity strategies for proactive defense of ICS assets, including defense-in-depth strategies.

extracted_playbook.title: Report Suspected Malicious Activity
extracted_playbook.description: Follow established internal procedures to report suspected malicious activity and report findings to CISA for tracking and correlation against other incidents.

extracted_playbook.title: Protect Against Social Engineering Attacks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not click web links or open attachments in unsolicited email messages. Refer to resources on recognizing and avoiding email scams and social engineering attacks.
